---
title: "C. elegans connectome visualization"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    theme: 
      version: 4
      bootswatch: lux
    orientation: rows
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(igraph)
library(networkD3)
library(readxl)

k <- readxl::read_xls("konektom.xls", sheet = "Connectome")
colnames(k) <- c('from', 'to', 'weight')

p <- simpleNetwork(k,
                   height = NULL,
                   width = NULL, 
                   Source = 1,
                   Target = 2,
                   linkDistance = 20,
                   charge = -100,
                   fontSize = 15,
                   fontFamily = "sans-serif",
                   linkColour = "#8d99ae",
                   nodeColour = "#2b2d42",
                   opacity = 0.5,
                   zoom = T
)
```


```{r}
p
```
